channel.title: Posts on Side Struggles
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Side Struggles

item.title: What to do?
item.description: I like the Disk Prices site. It holds incredible appeal to me because I am a software engineer who likes the bare minimum website. I plan to re-create the site for another retail item and earn money from Amazon affiliate marketing.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Happy 2024! Hi, my name is Phil. Welcome! I decided to start my side hustle as part of my 2024 New Year resolution. I hope to use this blog to motivate myself to continue working on my programming side projects. I will use it to hold myself accountable to work it throughout the year. My English is horrible. I just used Grammarly to fix my errors.
